title: Google, Facebook and Amazon face tough questioning over potential monopolies

title: Why Big Governments And Central Banks Want To Kill Libra And Bitcoin

title: Senate to grill Facebook over plans for Libra cryptocurrency
text: U.S. lawmakers from both sides of the aisle are set to grill Facebook Inc on its cryptocurrency plans on Tuesday, as the project continues to draw intense scrutiny from financial regulators and politicians across the globe.    Facebook is fighting a rearguard action to get Washington onside after it shocked regulators and lawmakers with an announcement on June 18 that it was hoping to launch a new digital coin called Libra in 2020.

title: Tech executives head to Capitol Hill for antitrust hearing
